title: Live Updates: Shinzo Abe in Hospital After Shooting
content:
1. Live Updates: Shinzo Abe in Hospital After Shooting  The New York Times
  2. Former Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe in a state of cardiopulmonary arrest after possible shooting, fire department says  CNN
  3. Japan ex-leader Shinzo Abe apparently shot  FOX31 Denver
  4. Former Japanese Prime Minister Shinzo Abe rushed to hospital after apparent shooting: Japanese media  Fox News
  5. Former PM Shinzo Abe critically shot in shock Japan attack  Yahoo News
